title: Adobe CJM ExperienceEvent - MessageProfile Details
description: MessageProfile details for the Adobe CJM ExperienceEvent.

@id.title: MessageProfile ID
@id.description: A unique id refers to every single message sent as part of a MessageExecution activity.

xdm:channel.title: Experience channel
xdm:channel.description: Experience channel related to the ExperienceEvent.

xdm:variant.title: Content Variant
xdm:variant.description: A message execution can have multiple variants e.g. Multilingual (translated variants for the same content) or A/B testing (different content to test what works better) but a message delivered to a recipient always contains one of them.
